inclusion.criterion: Received stable hemodialysis at least 3 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of a pacemaker, defibrillator, metallic sutures, or stent implantation and amputation of a major limb
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Gait speed in the lowest 20% of the sex- and height-specific distributions
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Handgrip strength in the lowest 20% of the sex- and BMI-specific distributions
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, which may be relevant for the study.
